ON HOLD

Hey everybody,

I have a low-grade, raw T206 Speaker for sale. Here's a description:
Two creases on the left side.
Rounded corners and some damage to the left border.
Scuffing on front, stain on back.
Off-center.
Good color and no creases through Speaker's head and upper body.
No paper loss.

Scans:
[IMG]http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f72/square5000/Speaker_front.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f72/square5000/Speaker_back.jpg[/IMG]

Asking $105. ON HOLD
Price includes 1st class shipping with insurance in a padded mailer with plenty of sturdy cardboard.

E-mail: [url]pbaldes@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks for looking!
Peter Baldes
